document.full_text: online video search firm blinkx is to buy online ad network burst media for $30 million to help build personalized online tv channels that should command premium rates from advertisers.
document.title: blinkx buys burst for $30 million to boost online tv
lines_and_colors: online video search firm blinkx is to buy online ad network burst media for $30 million to help build personalized online tv channels that should command premium rates from advertisers.
